name: Geometrica (FlowVix)
description:
Geometrica is a 30-level puzzle-platformer game where you have 4 geometry tools at your disposal. They are solid, allowing you to walk on them or block lasers. When 2 shapes meet, they intersect creating additional points, allowing for crazy combos that will assist you in finishing the level.

Made using the amazing Godot Game Engine! https://godotengine.org/

Music by: 

Alex McCulloch | https://opengameart.org/users/pro-sensory (Public Domain)

Additional sound effects provided by:

https://www.zapsplat.com/

Fonts used:

m5x7, m6x11 - Daniel Linssen | https://managore.itch.io/
Forced Square - DrawPerfect | https://drawperfect.com/
